mapper.select: select distinct d.dept_name_korean as deptNameKorean from haksa_class_by_department cbd inner join haksa_department d on cbd.dept_code = d.dept_code where semester_code=#{semesterCode}
select distinct class_by_department_grade as classByDepartmentGrade from haksa_class_by_department where dept_code=(select dept_code from haksa_department where dept_name_korean=#{departmentCode})

select lecture_status_number as lectureStatusNumber, subject_code as subjectCode, room_code as roomCode, appointment_school_personnel_number as appointmentSchoolPersonnelNumber from haksa_lecture_status where class_by_department_number=#{classByDepartmentNumber}
